body.name: Litokam Indoor Camera, Cameras for Home Security with Night Vision, Pet Camera with Phone App, 2K Indoor Security Camera, Motion Detection, 2-Way Audio, WiFi Camera Home Camera Compatible with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 42 mins
features: 【2K Full HD & Advanced Night Vision】Equipped with 2304*1296 Mega Pixels and high-tech optic lens, Litokam indoor camera can provide clearer picture quality and capture more detail. Litokam cameras for home security capture every detail, even in complete darkness, with 6 IR LEDs that provide up to 33 ft of night vision.

【Human Motion Detection & Real Time Alerts】Litokam indoor security camera can reduce false alarms with a human filtering function and receive instant alerts on your phone when motion is detected. Alert notifications will be sent to your phone immediately if human motion is detected. Litokam home camera supports adjusted sensibility to ensure you won't be disturbed by frequent alarms.

【2-Way Audio & Alexa/Google Assistant Compatible】Communicate with your family, kids, pets anytime, anywhere with Litokam wifi camera's built-in microphone and speaker. View live feeds of your security camera on Alexa or Google Assistant devices with simple voice commands (Only works with 2.4GHz WiFi).

【Double Storage & Encrypted Local Record】Save videos up to 128GB on a TF card (not included) or cloud storage (14-day free trial). 24/7 local recording ensures you never miss a moment, keep an eye on multiple areas of your home at the same time. High-level encryption technology can protect your data security even if this baby camera was stolen or broken.

【Multi-users & Multiple View】This pet camera with phone app supports no limit users to view simultaneously on iPhone and Android phones. You could share your indoor camera with friends and family for interesting moments. The "littlelf smart" APP can add multiple cameras for home security to display 16 live videos on 1 screen, more convenient for you to view multiple areas of your home at the same time. Never miss any important moments when you are away from home.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 1,100 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: Home Security, Pet Monitoring, Baby Monitoring, Indoor Security

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect little camera for all your indoor needs. Baby cam, pet cam, nanny cam, and definitely great for home security cam. I can set up the times that I want the camera to notify me on my phone in a moments time of any noises or human movement on the area that I have chosen for the cam to watch. Has excellent night vision. Can see so clearly in total darkness. This camera is everything it claims to do and more. I recommend this product to the first time camera buyer or one that is experienced in indoor cameras. They will not be disappointed. And the price. You just can't beat the price. Almost giving it away. Awesome camera. Plan on buying a few more for around my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WAY BETTER THAN BLINK!!
reviews.reviewText: Ok this cheap little camera actually surprised me to be honest! The connection& set up was a breeze. The picture quality is SO clear! My only issue has been video playback but I think that's a troubleshooting issue on my part that I need to handle. Overall, there's a ton of settings/options to play around with and the motion detection works without subscription OR an SD card, It gives you a snap clip picture of what triggered the sensor, which I thought was pretty cool. (My camera is looking through a REALLY old, dirty window with a THICK metal screen you can hardly see in the image)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cameras work great
reviews.reviewText: The picture and video quality is very good on these cameras the only down side is they don't have windows compatability but other than that they have a great camera with tons of features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and configure and very easily integrates with Alexa. I only wish it will love around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable camera with good quality
reviews.reviewText: I was not expecting for this camera to be this much of a steal. When I first purchased I did not have such high expectations especially since the camera was in a lower price range however I was proven wrong when I used the camera for more than just a month. I have been able to watch my dog and make sure he is comfortable at home and I have not had any issues. It brings an alarm setting and various other settings that make this camera stand out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, does the job
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to keep an eye on my sink (it keeps backing up). So when I am at work I can check on it. It was really easy to set up and the night vision is great. Much more than I expected for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera!!!
reviews.reviewText: Such a great little camera for such an amazing price! Picture quality is a good as a higher end camera we have and the night vision is Amazing! Set up was a breeze and the app is really easy to use. The best part is that it has a memory card slot for recordings. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good CCTV , Good Price
reviews.reviewText: Good CCTV camera with great softwareI got special discount too
